Farhan Akhtar & Shibani Dandekar’s Pics Will Give You All The Inspiration You Need To Plan A Summer Vacay ASAP!
It has just been a week into April and the summer heat is already burning us up. Indian summers are getting worse with every passing year. So, what do you do when you just can’t take the summer heat? Head for a mini-vacation, maybe!
Twitter
These pictures of Farhan Akhtar and Shibani Dandekar, the new most-talked-about couple in town, is making us want to plan a vacation ASAP.
Twitter
But remember, beaches are not everyone’s cup of tea especially in summers. Lying in the sand, swimming in the surf and lot and lots of ice cream – sounds like a good place, no? But, you can head to the hills too.

Farhan Akhtar and Shibani Dandekar are seemingly having a ball in Mexico!

Twitter
If you are also planning to head for a mini-vacation in India, here are the places that are best to visit during April – Dalhousie, Dharamshala, Manali, Khajjiar, Mussoorie, Kasauli, Gangtok, Pachmarhi, Lonavala, Cherrapunji, Coorg, Ooty, Andaman Islands, Masinagudi, Auli, Kodaikanal and Kalimpong.
Time to call your friends and plan a vacation?
